name: "Dead Like Me"- George Online Trivia | Dead Like Me | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Ellen Muth.

	Ellen Muth was also seen with Kathy Bates in "Dolores Claiborne". She is also a member of MENSA, a tribute to her intellect!

questions.text: Sometimes a reaping appointment does not go well with her work schedule. What excuse does George use to leave her job at Happy Time?
questions.correct: She has to house-sit for a friend
options: She has to look for a missing dog
questions.explanation:
She has to house-sit for a friend.

	George's boss Delores is very understanding about this, as she used to be addicted to cocaine in her earlier years. When Rube visits George at work, he pretends to also be from Alcoholics Anonymous.

questions.text: George gave up her virginity to this character.
questions.explanation:
"Trip" Hesburgh.

	Thomas "Trip" Hesburgh III later broke up with George, making her feel all the more angry. She quickly gets drunk and wrecks a store display of a bride and groom mannequin.

questions.text: When George was a small girl, she nearly drowned in a swimming pool.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Strangely, two Gravelings watched the whole event, but did not attempt to kill her. In the episode "Always", George is able to kill a Graveling, and it's implied that she has a special connection to them.

questions.text: George gets along well with senior citizens.
questions.explanation:
False.

	George finds old people weird. However, George does take care of an elderly woman's dog after she dies. The dog, named J.D. for "Just Dog", is given to the Lass family.

questions.text: What is George's alias when working at Happy Time?
questions.explanation:
Mildred Hagen.

	Along with her new name, George has a new face; Reapers have a different physical appearance when viewed by a living person. Only other Reapers see George's real face.

questions.text: In "My Room", who becomes George's roommate?
questions.explanation:
Daisy Adair.

	Daisy joins the team of Reapers after Betty leaves the group to explore. She is a former actress who died during the filming of "Gone With The Wind".

questions.text: In the episode "Nighthawks", George learns that Rube is going to reap someone at her address! Who does it turn out to be?
questions.explanation:
The milkman.

	All that worrying was for nothing! The episode "Nighthawks" also involves the Reapers taking an exam that George was left out of, which raises her ire.

questions.text: Who recognizes George at Happy Time in the episode "Haunted"?
questions.explanation:
Crystal.

	Crystal is a fellow employee at Happy Time who sports a pair of horn-rimmed glasses. This plot point was never elaborated because "Haunted" was the final episode in the series.

questions.text: In the episode "Sunday Mornings", George sits in on one of her father's classes. What does Clancy Lass teach?
questions.explanation:
English.

	Clancy is a tenured professor of English at the University of Washington in Seattle. He begins a relationship with a student whom George had befriended.
